name: Scooby-Doo! Night of 100 Frights
synopsis: The Mastermind has kidnapped Mystery Inc, and it's up to Scooby-Doo to search for his lost friends. Guide Scooby through 12 huge levels that include a creepy mansion, a spooky cave, a ghostly graveyard, and a perilous pier. As you search for clues, you must avoid classic Scooby-Doo monsters, use wacky inventions, eat Scooby Snacks, and gather power-ups. Do you have what it takes to foil the Mastermind's plan to rid the world of Mystery Inc?
